code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{BrowserRouter as Router,Route,Switch,Redirect}from'react-router-dom';import Movement from'./pages/Movement';import Meditation from'./pages/Meditation';import MorningPages from'./pages/MorningPages';import Signup from'./pages/Signup';import Login from'./pages/Login';import Homepage from'./pages/Homepage';import Profile from'./pages/Profile';import LandingPage from'./components/LandingPage';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const[hasSeenLandingPage,setHasSeenLandingPage]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{const seenLandingPage=localStorage.getItem('hasSeenLandingPage');if(seenLandingPage){setHasSeenLandingPage(true);}},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Router,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Switch,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/landing",component:LandingPage}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/signup",component:Signup}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/login",component:Login}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/profile",component:Profile}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/movement",component:Movement}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/meditation",component:Meditation}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/morning-pages",component:MorningPages}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",component:Homepage}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Redirect,{to:hasSeenLandingPage?'/login':'/landing'})]})});};export default App;
